column2: <s>ave you ever, even once, used any prescription tranquilizer in any way a doctor did not direct you to use it?</s>
Len : 2    EVER USED TRANQUILIZER NOT DIRECTED BY DR
OTE: The variable TRQNMREC is a recoded variable that was created from TRQNMLIF, the 12-month misuse variables of specific
Len : 2    RC - MOST RECENT TRANQUILIZER MISUSE (RECODE)
83 = DID NOT MISUSE PST 12 MOS (LIFETIME UNK) Log assn ................................
OTE: TRQNMINIT is "reverse coded" from the answers in TRL03. TRL03=1 (yes) was recoded to 2 in TRQNMINIT because this answer means
that the respondent misused tranquilizers before the past 12 months (and therefore is not a past year initiate for misuse of tranquilizers). TRL03=2
(no) was recoded to 1 in TRQNMINIT because this answer means that the respondent did not misuse tranquilizers before the past 12 months (and

column1: therefore is a past year initiate for misuse of tranquilizers).

column2: arlier questions were about the past 12 months. This question is about any time before then, that is, any time in your life before [DATEFILL].
<s>t any time before [DATEFILL], did you ever use any prescription tranquilizer in a way a doctor did not direct you to use it?</s>
Len : 2    PAST YEAR INITIATE FOR ANY TRANQUILIZER MISUSE
4 = Not past yr initiate LOG ASSN (from skip pattern) ......................................................
83 = NOT PAST YR INITIATE (AT-RISK STATUS UNKNOWN) ................................
93 = DID NOT MISUSE TRANQUILIZERS IN THE PAST 12 MOS ..............................
OTE: The variables TRQNMAGE, TRQNMYFU, and TRQNMMFU show the age, year, and month of first misuse, respectively, for respondents

column1: <s>who initiated misuse of tranquilizers in the 12 months prior to being interviewed (TRQNMINIT=1).</s>

column2: Len : 3    RC - AGE AT 1ST MISUSE FOR PAST YR TRANQ INITIATES
